column1: Image:J.R.R. Tolkien - Lake Mithrim.jpg - Lake Mithrim

Lake Mithrim was a body of water in the land of Mithrim with its long axis stretching from east to west.  When the Noldor first returned to Middle-earth the Sons of FÃ«anor encamped upon the northern shore and Fingolfins host upon the southern shore.
